system.requirements: Tier 1; T 35, Implanted Potentia or Mechanicus Implants. Aptitudes: Toughness, Tech
system.effect: When in the presence of a suitable power source, such as a portable generator or the power plant of a regimental vehicle, the character can make a +0 Toughness Test and recover Degree of Success levels of Fatigue.

description.value: When in the presence of a suitable power source, such as a portable generator or the power plant of a regimental vehicle, the character can make a +0 Toughness Test and recover Degree of Success levels of Fatigue.
